SELECT org.org_name, org.org_code, orgp.org_name AS parent_name, orgp.org_code AS parent_code, dict.label AS org_type_name, dicc.label AS org_level_name, org.org_desc FROM mp_organization org LEFT JOIN mp_organization orgp ON org.parent_id = orgp.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item dicc ON dicc.type = 'ZZCJ' AND dicc.value = org.org_level AND dicc.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item dict ON dict.type = 'ZZLX' AND dict.value = org.org_type AND dict.del_flag = 0
AND org.ORG_CODE LIKE concat(#{orgCode},'%')
LIMIT 0, 10
